item.description: Hey ladies! A few weeks ago I went to the Skyzone which is an indoor trampoline park. It is an absolute BLAST, not to mention an insane workout! It's located about 2.5 miles from Legacy Place so very easy to get to off of 128. I made the mistake of jumping for an hour my first time and couldn't walk for the next few days so I suggest we schedule a 30 minute slot. You have to go online and purchase your ticket for the time slot as they will sell out. It cost $8/30 minutes plus an additional $1 to reserve the slot. If you are interested in going, do NOT wait to show up and buy a ticket that day, as I promise they will be sold out for that time slot. If we aren't too exhausted and sweaty- maybe we can grab a bite/drinks at Legacy Place afterwards. Let's get our JUMP on!!! Lisa
item.name: SKYZONE in HYDE PARK!!! Let's get our JUMP on!!!
